clinical_study.brief_title: Epileptic Seizures in Intensive Care Units
clinical_study.official_title: Epileptic Seizures in Intensive Care Units

brief_summary.textblock: This retrospective observational cohort study is to assess and analyze clinical, electroencephalographic, laboratory, comorbidity, and treatment characteristics of Intensive care unit (ICU)-patients with epileptic seizures and to subsequently compare their characteristics with ICU-patients with status epilepticus (SE).

detailed_description.textblock: The aim of this retrospective observational cohort study is to get further insight into adult patients with epileptic seizures in ICUs in an academic tertiary medical care center regarding frequency, clinical and electroencephalogram (EEG) characteristics, treatment, course and outcome. This data could help understanding the epidemiology (including risk factors, influence of EEG), and to guide management and improve outcomes of affected patients.

primary_outcome.description: Frequency of all epileptic seizures in the ICU

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of epileptic seizures captured by EEG
secondary_outcome.description: Number of epileptic seizures captured by EEG without overt clinical seizure presentation in the ICU

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of epileptic seizures diagnosed on the basis of clinical symptoms alone
secondary_outcome.description: Number of epileptic seizures diagnosed on the basis of clinical symptoms alone in the ICU

secondary_outcome.measure: Semiological feature of epileptic seizure (i.e. seizure types)
secondary_outcome.description: Semiological feature of epileptic seizure (i.e. seizure types) emerging in ICU-patients

intervention.description: Patient data will be collected using the in-house digital patient record systems and the local digital electroencephalogram (EEG)-database

study_pop.textblock: All adult patients (i.e., â‰¥18 years of age) admitted to the ICUs at the University Hospital Basel that suffered from one or more epileptic seizures (detected clinically and/or by EEG) during their ICU-stay

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- admitted to the ICU at the University Hospital Basel
- suffered from one or more epileptic seizures (detected clinically and/or by EEG) during their ICU-stay
Exclusion Criteria:
- patients with epileptic seizures transforming into Status epilepticus (SE)
